details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.18 Annotations - 7.18.6.2 Media clip data - CT in media clip dictionary
details.description: In the media clip data dictionary, the optional CT key (ISO 32000-1:2008, 13.2.4.2, Table 274) is required.

rule.description: In the media clip data dictionary, the optional CT key (ISO 32000-1:2008, 13.2.4.2, Table 274) is required.

error.message: CT key is missing from the media clip data dictionary
